title: This Father’s Dinosaur Alter Ego Has Officially Lit Up Social Media
description: As people stay home in the hopes of preventing the further spread of the coronavirus, some people are fostering dogs to help ward off loneliness, strange dreams have become the norm for some, others are revisiting their teenage selves, while others get playfu…
